Protocols/CGA_WatchOS_Base_Protocol.html.name: updateUI()
Protocols/CGA_WatchOS_Base_Protocol.html.abstract: REQUIRED: This is called to update the UI of the controller to reflect the current state of the driver.

Protocols/CGA_WatchOS_Base_Protocol.html.name: CGA_WatchOS_Base_Protocol
Protocols/CGA_WatchOS_Base_Protocol.html.abstract: This is a protocol that allows us to have predictable methods for screen instances.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.abstract: This subscript allows us to use an Array just like a Dictionary.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.name: mainViewController
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.abstract: The main controller will always be the first one.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.name: topViewController
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa23Blue_Van_Cl.abstract: The top controller will always be the last one (most times, we will just have two controllers in the Array, anyway).

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: appDisplayName
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: The app name, as a string. It is required, and “ERROR” is returned if it is not present.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: appVersionString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: The app version, as a string. It is required, and “ERROR” is returned if it is not present.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: appVersionBuildString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: The build version, as a string. It is required, and “ERROR” is returned if it is not present.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: copyrightString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: If there is a copyright string, it is returned here. It may be nil.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: siteURIAsString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: If there is a copyright site URI, it is returned here as a String. It may be nil.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: helpURIAsString
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: If there is a help site URI, it is returned here as a String. It may be nil.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: siteURI
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: If there is a copyright site URI, it is returned here as a URL. It may be nil.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.name: helpURI
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC23.abstract: If there is a help site URI, it is returned here as a URL. It may be nil.

Extensions/Bundle.html.name: Bundle
Extensions/Bundle.html.abstract: This extension adds a few simple accessors for some of the more common bundle items.

Extensions/Array.html.name: Array
Extensions/Array.html.abstract: This extension adds a bit of extra “sauce” to the shared prefs class, in that it adds stuff specific to our platform.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceTableControll.name: serviceInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceTableControll.abstract: Each table item has an associated Service.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryTableContro.name: deviceDiscoveryData
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryTableContro.abstract: Each table item has an associated Peripheral, denoted by discovery data.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: labelObject
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is a label that displays the Descriptor name, as a “button.”

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: switchChanged(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is called when the switch changes value, and changes the notification state.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: blueThothElementInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is the element that is associated with the table element (either a Characteristic or a Descriptor).

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTableC.name: characteristicInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTableC.abstract: Each table item has an associated Service.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: serviceInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This is the device discovery struct that describes this device.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: characteristicsTable
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This displays the Characteristics the Service has available.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: populateTable()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This adds Services to the table for display.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This is called as the view is established.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Service.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: id
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: This is the ID for the main Discovery Screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: noBTImage
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: The image that indicates Bluetooth is not available.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: scanningSwitch
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: The switch that controls the scanning for Peripherals.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: deviceListTable
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: The table that lists the discovered devices.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: scanningSwitchChanged(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: Called when the Scanning switch changes value

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: Called as the View is set up.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: willDisappear()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: Called before the view disappears. We use this to stop the scanning.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: populateTable()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: This adds devices to the table for display.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Central Manager.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: connectionSegueID
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: The segue ID for the connection segue (from the CONNECT button).

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: deviceDiscoveryData
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This is the device discovery struct that describes this device.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: connectButton
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: If the device is connectable, this button is displayed, and will bring in the connected device screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This is called as the view is established.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: willActivate()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This is called as the view is about to become active.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: contextForSegue(withIdentifier:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This is called as we switch to the connection screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Peripheral Discovery.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: deviceDiscoveryData
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This is the device discovery struct that describes this device.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: connectingLabel
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This label is shown while the device is undergoing a connection, and is hidden upon connection.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: servicesTable
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This displays the Services the device has available.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: populateTable()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This adds Services to the table for display.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This is called as the view is established.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Peripheral.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.name: valueLabel
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.abstract: Displays the Descriptor value as text (if possible).

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.abstract: This is called as the view is established.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Descriptor.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: baseOfDescriptors
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This is the row index of the first Descriptor.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: propertiesTable
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This displays the Characteristics the Service has available.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: populateTable()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This adds Characteristic Properties to the table for display.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This is called as the view is established.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This sets everything up to reflect the current state of the Characteristic.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: rssiLevelLabel
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: This label displays the value of the RSSI slider

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: minimumRSSISlider
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: This is the slider that sets the minimum RSSI

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: connectedOnly
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Used to track the prefs value while in this screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: emptyNames
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Used to track the prefs value while in this screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: currentRSSI
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Used to track the prefs value while in this screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: extensionDelegateInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Simple accessor to the main extension delegate instance.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: connectedOnlySwitchHit(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Called when the “Connected Devices Only” switch is selected.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: emptyNamesSwitchHit(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Called when the “Allow Empty Names” switch is selected.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: Called as the View is set up.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.name: updateUI()
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_PrefsInterfaceContro.abstract: This sets the various items to match the values recorded.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_AboutInterfaceContro.name: versionLabel
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_AboutInterfaceContro.abstract: This label displays the app version, extracted from the bundle.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_AboutInterfaceContro.name: awake(withContext:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_AboutInterfaceContro.abstract: Called as the View is set up.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.name: id
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.abstract: This is a stored property that each screen sets to its ID.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.name: extensionDelegateInstance
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.abstract: Simple accessor to the main extension delegate instance.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This is the Central Manager instance. It is created by the intial screen, but stored here.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: screenList
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This contains all of our screens. The key is the ID of the device or attribute associated with that screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: prefs
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This contains our stored preferences.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: mainScreen
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Quick accessor for the main discovery screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: topScreen
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Quick accessor for the top screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: extensionDelegateObject
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Quick access to the extension delegate object.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: displayAlert(header:message:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Displays the given message and title in an alert with an “OK” button.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: createAdvertimentStringsFor(_:id:power:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This special class function creates an Array of String, containing the advertisement data from the indexed device.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: handle(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This is called while the app is in the background, with various tasks that need to be handled.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: handleError(_:from:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to report an error.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: updateFrom(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell this controller to recalculate the discovery table.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManagerPoweredOn(_:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that the state of the Central manager just became “powered on.”

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:didConnectThisDevice:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a Peripheral device has been connected.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:willDisconnectThisDevice:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a peripheral device is about to be disconnected.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:deviceInfoChanged:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This is called to tell the instance that a Peripheral device has had some change.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:device:changedService:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a Service changed.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:device:service:changedCharacteristic:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a Characteristic changed its value.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:device:service:changedCharacteristicNotificationState:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a Characteristic changed its notification state.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:device:service:characteristic:changedDescriptor:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: Called to tell the instance that a Descriptor changed.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: centralManager(_:device:service:characteristicWriteComplete:)
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This is called to tell the instance that a Characteristic write with response received its response.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getCurrentTimelineEntry(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This sets the current timeline entry for the complication.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getTimelineEntries(for:before:limit:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This is called to populate a set of timeline entries (should never be called).

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getTimelineEntries(for:after:limit:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This is called to populate a set of timeline entries (should never be called).

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getAlwaysOnTemplate(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This sets the template object for the complication when in “always on” mode.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getLocalizableSampleTemplate(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This sets the supported placeholder for the composer.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getTimelineEndDate(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: Sets the (non-existent) end date for the (non-existent) timeline.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getPrivacyBehavior(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This is called to say whether or not to display the complication in lock.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.name: getSupportedTimeTravelDirections(for:withHandler:)
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html#.abstract: This sets the supported Time Travel directions (We don’t do any).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: continuouslyUpdatePeripherals
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: peripheralFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Peripherals for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: serviceFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Services for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: characteristicFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Characteristics for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: minimumRSSILevel
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a signed Integer, with the minimum RSSI.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: discoverOnlyConnectableDevices
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Bool, true, if we are filtering out non-connectable devices.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: allowEmptyNames
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Bool, true, if we are allowing devices that don’t have names to be discovered.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: alwaysUseCRLF
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a Bool, true, if we will always force endline/carriage returns to be CRLF pairs.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: tableSelectionBackgroundColor
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This will be a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the selected table cells.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: textColorForUnselectableCells
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This is a floating-point number to be used as an alpha component.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: allKeys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: These are all the keys, in an Array of String.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html.name: Keys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs/Keys.html.abstract: This is an enumeration that will list the prefs keys for us.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:23Bl.name: keys
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:23Bl.abstract: This is a list of the keys for our prefs.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: continuouslyUpdatePeripherals
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: discoverOnlyConnectableDevices
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then devices that are not advertising as connctable will be ignored.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: allowEmptyNames
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then devices that do not have names will be included. Default is false.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: alwaysUseCRLF
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then we will always send newlines as CRLF pairs. Default is false.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: minimumRSSILevel
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a Boolean value. If true, then the scan will not use duplicate filtering (meaning that it will be continuously updating).

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: peripheralFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Peripherals for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: serviceFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Services for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: characteristicFilterIDArray
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the UUIDs of specific Characteristics for which we are filtering.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: tableSelectionBackgroundColor
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a CGColor, indicating the color to use for the selected table cells.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.name: textColorForUnselectableCells
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@B.abstract: This is a floating-point number to be used as an alpha component. We use it for the table cells that can’t be clicked.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:23Bl.name: scanCriteria
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:23Bl.abstract: This is the scan criteria object to be used for filtering scans.

Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html.name: CGA_PersistentPrefs
Classes/CGA_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This is the subclass of the preferences type that will provide our persistent app settings.

Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html.name: CGA_ComplicationController
Classes/CGA_ComplicationController.html.abstract: This adds support for the various complications provided by this app.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.name: CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ExtensionDelegate.ht.abstract: This is the main app extension delegate class.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.name: CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_BaseInterfaceControl.abstract: This is a base class for screen instance View Controllers.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.name: CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicInterf.abstract: This View Controller is for the individual Characteristic screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.name: CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DescriptorInterfaceC.abstract: This View Controller is for the individual Characteristic screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.name: CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DeviceInterfaceContr.abstract: This View Controller is for the individual device screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.name: CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryInterfaceCo.abstract: This View Controller is for the individual device screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.name: CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_MainInterfaceControl.abstract: This is the controller for the initial extension screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.name: CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceInterfaceCont.abstract: This View Controller is for the individual Service screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTableC.name: CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTableController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTableC.abstract: This is the controller for the characteristic display screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables_Base
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is a base class for the various table controller types.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables_Button
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is a button that allows us to read a value.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.name: CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables_DescriptorButton
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_CharacteristicTables.abstract: This is a simple label, but in a “touchable” row, that opens a Descripto inspection screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryTableContro.name: CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryTableController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_DiscoveryTableContro.abstract: This is the controller for the discovered peripheral display screen.

Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceTableControll.name: CGA_WatchOS_ServiceTableController
Classes/CGA_WatchOS_ServiceTableControll.abstract: This is the controller for the discovered services display screen.
